sourcesContent:
import React, { useEffect, useMemo, useState } from 'react' import { FontAwesomeIcon } from '@fortawesome/react-fontawesome' import { icons } from '../../helpers/icon' import { useWallet } from 'use-wallet' import { provider } from 'web3-core' import { getContractOf } from '../../utils/erc20' import NFTStakingABI from '../../assets/abi/test/NFTStakingABI.json'; import NFTMockABI from '../../assets/abi/test/NFTMockABI.json'; import LPStakingABI from '../../assets/abi/test/LPStakingABI.json'; import LudusABI from '../../assets/abi/test/LudusABI.json'; import LudusStakingABI from '../../assets/abi/test/LudusStakingABI.json'; import LudusGenesis001 from '../../assets/img/ludusGenesis001.png' import LudusGenesis002 from '../../assets/img/ludusGenesis002.png' import LudusGenesis003 from '../../assets/img/ludusGenesis003.png' import CustomButton from '../../components/CustomButton/CustomButton' const FarmsContent: React.FC = () => { const { account, ethereum } = useWallet() const LudusStakingContract = useMemo(() => { return getContractOf(LudusStakingABI, ethereum as provider, '0xDb2f554A333D189ed59eA36020a83F7d6De14328') }, [account]) const LudusContract = useMemo(() => { return getContractOf(LudusABI, ethereum as provider, '0xFe44FF05D7C06E792D6eF4762B2441e82Bc602a5') }, [account]) const LPStakingContract = useMemo(() => { return getContractOf(LPStakingABI, ethereum as provider, '0x94A44de106112A761B69dFBEB1ac6cfdD1B80304') }, [account]) const NFTStakingContract = useMemo(() => { return getContractOf(NFTStakingABI, ethereum as provider, '0x47330D2fe6F75899597C14d615003Ef561B01B14') }, [account]) const NFTMockContract = useMemo(() => { return getContractOf(NFTMockABI, ethereum as provider, '0x07bf260a44CEADfad215cc8e20c5b0398D25b1FA') }, [account]) const [ludusGenesis001, setLudusGenesis001] = useState(0) const [ludusGenesis002, setLudusGenesis002] = useState(0) const [ludusGenesis003, setLudusGenesis003] = useState(0) const [ludusBalance, setLudusBalance] = useState(0) const [lpBalance, setLpBalance] = useState(0) useEffect(() => {}, [account]) const approveNFTStaking = () => { console.log('NFTMockContract', NFTMockContract) } const stakeNFT = () => { const stakeMethode = NFTStakingContract.methods.stake('181087', 1).call(); stakeMethode.then((staked: any) => { console.log('staked', staked); }) console.log('NFTStakingContract', NFTStakingContract) } const approveLP = () => { const encodeABI = LudusContract.methods.approve(account, 1000000).encodeABI(); console.log('encodeABI', encodeABI) console.log('LudusContract', LudusContract) } return (
NFT Staking
Ludus Genesis 001
(ludusGenesis001 === 0 || !account) ? null : setLudusGenesis001(ludusGenesis001 - 1)}>
{ludusGenesis001}
(!account) ? null : setLudusGenesis001(ludusGenesis001 + 1)}>
Ludus Genesis 002
(ludusGenesis002 === 0 || !account) ? null : setLudusGenesis002(ludusGenesis002 - 1)}>
{ludusGenesis002}
(!account) ? null : setLudusGenesis002(ludusGenesis002 + 1)}>
Ludus Genesis 003
(ludusGenesis003 === 0 || !account) ? null : setLudusGenesis003(ludusGenesis003 - 1)}>
{ludusGenesis003}
(!account) ? null : setLudusGenesis003(ludusGenesis003 + 1)}>
Approve Stake Claim Unstake
Single asset staking
Your Ludus balans
{ludusBalance}
Approve Stake Claim Unstake
LP Staking
Your LP Balans
{lpBalance}
Approve Stake Claim Unstake
) } export default FarmsContent
